# Introduction

"Welcome to all people... To this land of ochre" - Ruby Hunter

The [**ochre**](CRAN link?) package contains colour palettes inspired by the Australian landscape, iconic Australian artists and images. 

# Installation

``` r
install.packages("ochre")
```

**Or the development version**

``` r
devtools::install_github("ropenscilabs/ochre")
```

# The Palettes

The package contains eleven colour palettes: 



Usage
-----

``` r
library("ochre")

# See all palettes
names(ochre_palettes)
#>  [1] "BottleRocket1"  "BottleRocket2"  "Rushmore1"      "Royal1"        
#>  [5] "Royal2"         "Zissou1"        "Darjeeling1"    "Darjeeling2"   
#>  [9] "Chevalier1"     "FantasticFox1"  "Moonrise1"      "Moonrise2"     
#> [13] "Moonrise3"      "Cavalcanti1"    "GrandBudapest1" "GrandBudapest2"
```
